# supportsVideo

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the provider supports video in addition to audio.

## Declaration

```swift
var supportsVideo: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this property is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Configuring Call Capabilities

- **maximumCallGroups**: The maximum number of call groups.
- **maximumCallsPerCallGroup**: The maximum number of calls per call group.
- **supportedHandleTypes**: The supported handle types.
- **includesCallsInRecents**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the provider includes a call in the system’s Recents list after the call ends.
